text: Gruny may refer to: * Gruny, Somme, Hauts-de-France, France * Grúny, also spelled Gruni, Belinț, Romania * Grúny, also spelled Gruni, Cornereva, Romania ==People with the surname== * Berta Gruny, mother of Wilhelm Dürr the Younger * Jim Gruny, commander of Marine Recruit Training Regiment San Diego * Nadia Gruny (born 1984), American cricket player * Pascale Gruny (born 1960), French politician ==See also== * Grundy (disambiguation) * Gruni (disambiguation)
title: Gruny
